metadata.subject: Publishers and publishing
metadata.title: Réponse du Sieur Guyot
metadata.creator: Guyot,M.(Joseph Nicolas),1728-1816,
Guyot, M. (Joseph Nicolas), 1728-1816, supposed author
Desaint, Catherine (Chaucat)
Guyot, Pierre Jean Jacques Guillaume, supposed author
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 8 no. 106
metadata.description: Caption title. Imprint at foot of p. 12

Relating to a legal dispute over the publication rights of Répertoire universel & raisonné de jurisprudence civile, criminelle, canonique & bénéficiale, the editorship of which is ascribed either to J. N. Guyot or Pierre Jean Jacques Guillaume Guyot
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Text extends off of the edge of the page. Title page and cover are combined.
